hab <- physiologies("habitat")[["habitat"]] %>%
          as_tibble()
grepl("^[0-9]+$", hab$NCBI_ID) %>%
        as_tibble() %>%
            magrittr::set_colnames("Taxa") %>%
            mutate(Taxa = ifelse(Taxa == TRUE, "Taxa with NCBI ID", "Taxa without NCBI ID")) %>%
            count(Taxa) %>%
           ggplot(aes(Taxa, n)) +
            geom_col(fill = "gray50", color = "black") +
            geom_label(aes(label = n)) +
            labs(title = "Number of taxa in the habitat dataset",
                    x = "Taxa", y = "Number of Taxa")
          theme_bw()
